doc.title: Booker Prize Live 2004
doc.plot: BBC TWO and BBC FOUR coverage of the prestigious Booker Prize Award for 2004 Live from The Royal Horticultural Halls, Westminister, London UK 19th October 2004, Alan Hollinghurst was named as the winner of the Â£50,000 prize for his fourth novel "The Line of Beauty" published by Picador.
